description:
Class 2-C take a cruise to warm up their winter vacation, but a run-in with a reef puts a dent in their carefree affairs. When high-flying Hanai lands on unfamiliar territory, he runs in to some familiar faces!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minami no Niji no 2-C! / Fushigi no Shima no Yakumo! / Nanatsu no Umi no...!
Southern Rainbow 2-C! / Ya`akumo of the Mysterious Island! / The Seven Seas!
南の虹の2-C! / ふしぎな島のヤークモ! / 七つの海の...!
